name: Godot Pong (Sh1co)
description:
Github link

Only PvP is available at the moment.

PvP:

Local 1v1 pong game, first to reach 7 points wins.

Controls

Space (or A on xbox controller) : Make the ball move

Player 1:

W :  move up

S: move down

or using left joy stick

Player 2:

UP :  move up

DOWN: move down

or using right joy stick

PvE:

Unavailable atm
